Uses of Class
squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.SparseLayers

    • Uses of SparseLayers in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx

      Subclasses of SparseLayers in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SquidMessageBox
      A specialized SquidPanel that is meant for displaying messages in a scrolling pane.
      class  SubcellLayers
      A subclass of SparseLayers that acts almost the same, but uses 3x3 subcells of background color for every cell that may contain a char.
      Fields in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx declared as SparseLayers 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      SparseLayers StarterKit.layers
      The main way to interact with a text-based grid as for roguelikes.
      Methods in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx that return SparseLayers 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SparseLayers SparseLayers.setTextSize(float wide, float high)
      Changes the width and height of chars the font renders, inside the same cell size.
      Methods in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx with parameters of type SparseLayers 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LightingHandler.draw(SparseLayers layers)
      Given a SparseLayers, fills the SparseLayers with different colors based on what lights are present in line of sight of the viewer and the various flicker or strobe effects that Radiance light sources can do.
      void WildMapView.show(SparseLayers layers)
